data.title: Katy Perry Archives
data.meta_description: Katy Perry is a singer and TV personality who’s known for her songs “I Kissed a Girl,” “Teenage Dream,” “Firework,” “Roar,” “Dark Horse,” and more.
data.text:
Thanks, I Hate It

Luke Bryan Is ‘Sitting Back and Waiting’ to See If He’s Returning to ‘American Idol’

Fans want to know who's replacing Katy Perry on 'American Idol.' And they also want to know if Lionel Richie and Luke Bryan are returning. Here's what Bryan said.

Celebrity

Jennifer Lopez Said ‘American Idol’ Proved She Was a Nice Person

Jennifer Lopez said people didn't seem to understand her. She shared how her role as a judge on 'American Idol' changed this.

Thanks, I Hate It

‘American Idol’ Fans React to Season 22 Winner Abi Carter: ‘Most Talented Singer in Years’

Abi Carter, who received a Platinum Ticket from the ‘American Idol’ judges after her audition, was named the season 22 winner after a three-hour long finale.

Music

Why ‘California Gurls’ Almost Wasn’t on Katy Perry’s ‘Teenage Dream’ Album

Katy Perry's producer, Dr. Luke Gottwald, wanted to add "California Gurls" and "Teenage Dream" to her 'Teenage Dream' album even after others thought the album was complete. The public seemed to embrace the songs.

Music / Net worth

What is Katy Perry’s Net Worth in 2021?

Katy Perry has been entertaining audiences for over a decade with her infectious music and stage presence. She's become one of the biggest pop stars in the world with several hit records to her name. She's built an empire for herself over the past several years, and her net worth is reflective of her efforts

Celebrity

Katy Perry Calls Being a Mom ‘the Best’ and ‘Most Fulfilling’ Job She’s Ever Had

Katy Perry is basking in the joys of motherhood. Eight months after welcoming her daughter, Daisy Dove, with fiancé Orlando Bloom, the singer reflected on her motherhood journey with supermodel Miranda Kerr on a recent Instagram Live. Not only did the women gush about the "unconditional love" they receive from their children, but Perry also opened up her role as a mom, calling it "the best job" ever.
